summary: Updated libtiff packages fix security vulnerabilities
details:
LibTIFF is vulnerable to an integer overflow. This flaw allows remote
attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly
execute an arbitrary code via a crafted tiff image, which triggers a
heap-based buffer overflow. (CVE-2023-40745)
A vulnerability was found in libtiff due to multiple potential integer
overflows in raw2tiff.c. This flaw allows remote attackers to cause a
denial of service or possibly execute an arbitrary code via a crafted
tiff image, which triggers a heap-based buffer overflow.
(CVE-2023-41175)
